com.ibasco.agql.core.transport

Class NettyPooledTransport<M extends AbstractRequest,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibasco.agql.core.transport.NettyTransport<M>
      • com.ibasco.agql.core.transport.NettyPooledTransport<M,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - A type of AbstractRequest that will be used as a lookup reference for our key
    K - A type of the value for the internal ChannelPoolMap implementation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transport<M>, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NettyPooledTcpTransport, NettyPooledUdpTransport

    public abstract class NettyPooledTransport<M extends AbstractRequest,K>
extends NettyTransport<M>

    A transport that use a pool implementation to create or re-use a Channel

      • cleanupChannel

        public void cleanupChannel(io.netty.channel.Channel c)

        A method to perform cleanup operations on a Channel. This is called after every invocation of NettyTransport.send(AbstractRequest).

        Overrides:
        cleanupChannel in class NettyTransport<M extends AbstractRequest>
        Parameters:
        c - The Channel that will need to be cleaned-up/released.
